title: London Lace, #5
description: The hotly-anticipated fifth and final installment of London Lace is here.The Royal Ascot is only the most exclusive event of Londonâ€™s society calendar. Eliza is contracted to design hats for the royals. During the most terrifying challenge of her career, she also faces challenges of the heart. Forced to sneak around with Sir Todd for their secret affair makes stolen moments in his strong arms all the sweeter for their danger. But as the ravenous press closes in and scandal threatens to destroy their connection, everything Todd and Eliza have built begins to crumble. The pair must decide if they're willing to bet everything on love.
author: Catou Martine
